Organization based in.content:
Please analyze the given text to identify relationships where an organization is headquartered or primarily operates in a specific location. Look for patterns that indicate this type of relationship.

If exists, please present the valid relationships as a Markdown table with columns "['Organization', 'Location', 'Whether the Organization is based in the Location']". Make sure the table items are from the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Photo , COLOR , The father of our 34th President was working as a railroad laborer when his son Dwight D. Eisenhower was born on Oct. 14 , 1890 , in a modest two-story frame house in Denison , Tex .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization | Location | Whether the Organization is based in the Location |
|---|---|---|
| The father of our 34th President | Denison, Tex | Yes, based on the context it can be inferred that the father of Dwight D. Eisenhower was working at the location mentioned during his son's birth. |
| Railroad company (implied) | Denison, Tex | No, the text does not explicitly state that the railroad company was based in Denison, Tex. It only mentions that the father of Dwight D. Eisenhower was working as a railroad laborer in Denison, Tex. |
| The White House (implied) | Washington D.C. (not explicitly mentioned but can be inferred as the location where the President would be based) | Yes, the 34th President, Dwight D. Eisenhower, was based in Washington D.C. after his election. However, this information is not provided in the paragraph. |
